name: Spinman's Shitpost Adventure (ft. Jotaro Kujo)
description:
!!Note: RESPECT JOTARO! Let his voice lines finish before going to the next text box!!

Plot summary:

A non-cannon and underrated, yet spectacular in it's own right, addition to the beloved and well known SpinMan series. In this addition, SpinMan is trying to overspin the fans in a computer in order to make it explode, probably because it's user has posted something cringe. But, his plans are interrupted by, the obscure protagonist of some manga nobody heard about, Jotaro Kujo. In a story about life, death and the will to keep fighting for what you truly believe.

Features:
-carefully crafted level design
-speedrun friendly
-engaging story
-adaptive, as well as, selectable difficulty
-over a billion achievements to collect
-a fun new twist on a beloved series
-adaptive soundtrack
-fun for the whole family
-IT EVEN WORKS UNDERWATER!

P.S: This is all a shitpost so don't take any of it seriously
